languages.text: Арджента и Лорд-капитан наконец-то получили намек на возможное местоположение планеты Салис Прайм. Там находится древний корабль святой, к которому Арджента желает совершить паломничество. Но там же находятся и силы еретиков, уже однажды едва не убивших Сестру битвы...

traits.locale_text: Арджента и Лорд-капитан наконец-то получили намек на возможное местоположение планеты Салис Прайм. Там находится древний корабль святой, к которому Арджента желает совершить паломничество. Но там же находятся и силы еретиков, уже однажды едва не убивших сестру битвы...

languages.text: At long last, Argenta and the Lord Captain have uncovered a clue to the possible location of the world of Salis Prime, and with it, that of the saint's ancient ship to which Argenta wishes to make a pilgrimage. However, the planet also serves as a hideout for the heretics who have already come close to taking her life once before...
languages.original_text: Арджента и Лорд-капитан наконец-то получили намек на возможное местоположение планеты Салис Прайм. Там находится древний корабль святой, к которому Арджента желает совершить паломничество. Но там же находятся и силы еретиков, уже однажды едва не убивших Сестру битвы...

traits.locale_text: At long last, Argenta and the Lord Captain have uncovered a clue to the possible location of the world of Salis Prime, and with it, that of the saint's ancient ship to which Argenta wishes to make a pilgrimage. However, the planet also serves as a hideout to the heretics who have already come close to taking her life once before...

At long last, Argenta and the Lord Captain have uncovered a clue to the possible location of the world of Salis Prime, and with it, that of the saint's ancient ship to which Argenta wishes to make a pilgrimage. However, the planet also serves as a hideout to the heretics who have already come close to taking her life once before...

At long last, Argenta and the Lord Captain have uncovered a clue to the possible location of the world of Salis Prime, and with it, that of the saint's ancient ship to which Argenta wishes to make a pilgrimage. However, the planet also serves as a hideout for the heretics who have already come close to taking her life once before...

At long last, Argenta and the Lord Captain have uncovered a clue to the possible location of the world of Salis Prime, and with it, that of the saint's ancient ship to which Argenta wishes to make a pilgrimage. However, the planet also serves as a hideout for the heretics who have already come close to taking her life once before...

languages.text: Argenta et {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ont enfin une piste qui pourrait leur permettre de retrouver Salis Primus et le vaisseau de la sainte, où la Sœur de Bataille souhaite se rendre en pèlerinage. Cependant, la planète sert également de refuge aux hérétiques qui ont déjà failli lui ôter la vie...
languages.original_text: At long last, Argenta and the Lord Captain have uncovered a clue to the possible location of the world of Salis Prime, and with it, that of the saint's ancient ship to which Argenta wishes to make a pilgrimage. However, the planet also serves as a hideout for the heretics who have already come close to taking her life once before...

traits.locale_text: Argenta et {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ont enfin une piste qui pourrait leur permettre de retrouver Salis Primus et le vaisseau de la sainte, où la Sœur de Bataille souhaite se rendre en pèlerinage. Cependant, la planète sert également de refuge aux hérétiques qui ont déjà failli lui ôter la vie...

languages.text: 到了最后，阿洁塔与行商浪人终于找到了线索，发现了萨利斯主星可能的位置，也找到了阿洁塔打算朝圣的那艘圣船。然而，那颗行星也同样是异端分子的藏身之处，阿洁塔曾经险些死在那些狡猾的敌人手中……
languages.original_text: At long last, Argenta and the Lord Captain have uncovered a clue to the possible location of the world of Salis Prime, and with it, that of the saint's ancient ship to which Argenta wishes to make a pilgrimage. However, the planet also serves as a hideout for the heretics who have already come close to taking her life once before...

traits.locale_text: 到了最后，阿根塔与行商浪人终于找到了线索，发现了萨利斯主星可能的位置，也找到了阿洁塔打算朝圣的那艘圣船。然而，那颗行星也同样是异端分子的藏身之处，阿洁塔曾经险些死在那些狡猾的敌人手中……

languages.text: ついにアルジェンタとロード・キャプテンは、サリス・プライムの惑星の位置を知る手がかりをつかんだ。さらにはアルジェンタが巡礼を希望している聖人の古代の船も一緒に発見された。しかしこの惑星は、異端者たちの隠れ家にもなっている。かつて、彼女の命を奪おうとした異端者どもの。
languages.original_text: At long last, Argenta and the Lord Captain have uncovered a clue to the possible location of the world of Salis Prime, and with it, that of the saint's ancient ship to which Argenta wishes to make a pilgrimage. However, the planet also serves as a hideout for the heretics who have already come close to taking her life once before...

traits.locale_text: ついにアルジェンタとロード・キャプテンは、サリス・プライムの惑星の位置を知る手がかりをつかんだ。さらにはアルジェンタが巡礼を希望している聖人の古代の船も一緒に発見された。しかしこの惑星は、異端者たちの隠れ家にもなっている。かつて、彼女の命を奪おうとした異端者どもの。

languages.text: Argenta und der Lord Captain haben endlich einen Hinweis auf die mögliche Position der Welt Salis Prime erhalten — und damit auch des uralten Schiffs des Heiligen, zu dem Argenta pilgern möchte. Der Planet dient jedoch auch den Ketzern als Versteckt, die ihr schon einmal fast das Leben genommen hätten ...
languages.original_text: At long last, Argenta and the Lord Captain have uncovered a clue to the possible location of the world of Salis Prime, and with it, that of the saint's ancient ship to which Argenta wishes to make a pilgrimage. However, the planet also serves as a hideout for the heretics who have already come close to taking her life once before...

traits.locale_text: Argenta und der Lord Captain haben endlich einen Hinweis auf die mögliche Position der Welt Salis Prime erhalten — und damit auch des uralten Schiffs des Heiligen, zu dem Argenta pilgern möchte. Der Planet dient jedoch auch den Ketzern als Versteckt, die ihr schon einmal fast das Leben genommen hätten ...

languages.text: Por fin, Argenta y {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán han encontrado una pista sobre el posible paradero de Salis Prime, y por lo tanto de la antigua nave de la santa hasta la que Argenta quiere hacer una peregrinación. Sin embargo, el planeta también sirve de escondite a los herejes que ya estuvieron a punto de matarla una vez...
languages.original_text: At long last, Argenta and the Lord Captain have uncovered a clue to the possible location of the world of Salis Prime, and with it, that of the saint's ancient ship to which Argenta wishes to make a pilgrimage. However, the planet also serves as a hideout for the heretics who have already come close to taking her life once before...

traits.locale_text: Por fin, Argenta y {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán han encontrado una pista sobre el posible paradero de Salis Prime, y por lo tanto de la antigua nave de la santa hasta la que Argenta quiere hacer una peregrinación. Sin embargo, el planeta también sirve de escondite a los herejes que ya estuvieron a punto de matarla una vez...

languages.text: Nihayet Argenta ve Lord Kaptan, Salis Prime dünyasının ve Argenta'nın hac yolculuğuna çıkmak istediği azizenin kadim gemisinin olası konumuna dair bir ipucu buldu. Fakat bu gezegen, daha önce onun canını almaya çok yaklaşan kâfirlere de ev sahipliği yapıyor.
languages.original_text: At long last, Argenta and the Lord Captain have uncovered a clue to the possible location of the world of Salis Prime, and with it, that of the saint's ancient ship to which Argenta wishes to make a pilgrimage. However, the planet also serves as a hideout for the heretics who have already come close to taking her life once before...
